question.title: Take a single JSON object and divide it into multiple JSON objects. make API calls concurrently
question.body:
The data I received is a large dynamic JSON, and I need to split it into multiple JSON objects to make API requests dynamically in Java. Each api call passes 30 objects in maximum. So if the total number of object is 500, then it requires to make multiple api calls.

Initially, some users receive 11 objects in the JSON dynamically, while others receive 25.

The process involves splitting the single JSON into multiple JSON objects and then making the API call.

{"total":11, "plist":[
{ 
  "reference" : "ABCDE123455432101",
  "date" : "01/01/2021",
  "value" : 111,
},{ 
  "reference" : "ABCDE123455432102",
  "date" : "02/02/2022",
  "value" : 222,

},{ 
  "reference" : "ABCDE123455432103",
  "date" : "03/03/2023",
  "value" : 333,

},{ 
  "reference" : "ABCDE123455432104",
  "date" : "04/04/2024",
  "value" : 444,

},{ 
  "reference" : "ABCDE123455432105",
  "date" : "05/05/2025",
  "value" : 555,
},{ 
  "reference" : "ABCDE123455432106",
  "date" : "06/06/2026",
  "value" : 666,

},{ 
  "reference" : "ABCDE123455432107",
  "date" : "17/08/2027",
  "value" : 777,

},{ 
  "reference" : "ABCDE123455432108",
  "date" : "08/08/2028",
  "value" : 888,

}
,{ 
  "reference" : "ABCDE123455432109",
  "date" : "09/09/2029",
  "value" : 999,
}
,{ 
  "reference" : "ABCDE123455432110",
  "date" : "09/10/2029",
  "value" : 100,
}
,{ 
  "reference" : "ABCDE123455432110",
  "date" : "09/10/2029",
  "value" : 100,
}
}]

My question is how to prepare dynamic API call based on JSON payload size? Each API call need to send maximum 30. So, validate the incoming payload size and make dynamic API call with 30 objects
